snippet: Former State Senator Pedro Espada Jr. of the Bronx, on trial with his son Pedro Gautier Espada, said “evil spiritual powers” were at work after jurors indicated progress on their deliberations.
abstract: Jurors in federal embezzlement trial of former New York State Senator Pedro Espada Jr indicate that they might be close to a verdict after nine days of deliberations.
lead_paragraph: Former State Senator Pedro Espada Jr. of the Bronx, on trial with his son Pedro Gautier Espada, said “evil spiritual powers” were at work after jurors indicated progress on their deliberations.

headline.seo: Jurors in Espada Embezzlement Trial Indicate Verdict May Be Near
headline.main: In Reversal, Espada Jurors Indicate a Verdict Is Near
headline.print_headline: In Reversal, Espada Jurors Indicate a Verdict May Be Near
